MonsterTrait.Name: Cunning Action
MonsterTrait.Text: On each of its turns, the orc can use a bonus action to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

MonsterTrait.Name: Hand of Shargaas
MonsterTrait.Text: The orc deals an 2 extra dice of damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack (included in its attacks).

MonsterTrait.Name: Shargaas's Sight
MonsterTrait.Text: Magical darkness doesn’t impede the orc’s darkvision.

MonsterTrait.Name: Slayer
MonsterTrait.Text: In the first round of a combat, the orc has advantage on attack rolls against any creature that hasn’t taken a turn yet. If the orc hits a creature that round who was surprised, the hit is automatically a critical hit.

MonsterTrait.Name: Multiattack
MonsterTrait.Text: The orc makes two scimitar or dart attacks.

MonsterAction.Name: Scimitar
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (3d6+3) slashing damage.

MonsterAction.Name: Dart
MonsterAction.Text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (3d4+3) piercing damage.

MonsterTrait.Name: Veil of Shargaas (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
MonsterTrait.Text: The orc casts darkness without any components. Wisdom is its spellcasting ability.
